pages.text: The crucible is a device that can collect and hold tears.$(br2)The silver used in the creation of this seems to be able to contain the naturally corrosive substance...$(br2) $(#12b88e)$(t:Maybe I can create a new material by throwing mundane substances like iron into it?)Notes$(/t)

Placing a crying obsidian over a crucible will fill it with tears.$(br2)Collecting tears from crying obsidian is rather slow, a more effective alternatives should exist.$(br2)$(#f00)WARNING:$(br)DO NOT SPILL TEARS$()

pages.name: Tear Collection
pages.text: The gap between the crying obsidian and the crucible can be up to 4 blocks.
